create table if not exists dim_subject_wb ( id bigserial primary key,
account_id bigint not null,
source_subject_id bigint not null, subject_name text not null,
parent_category_id bigint, parent_category_name text,
created_at timestamptz not null default now(), updated_at timestamptz not null default now(),
constraint uq_dim_subject_wb_source unique (account_id, source_subject_id) );
